participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and detail-oriented, Emily loves planning events and is passionate about technology.
participant_1.background: I learned about the latest technology and kept my lizard, Ragini, fed and healthy. I am a wedding planner who is always on the lookout for new business opportunities. I enjoy summer walking and reading. I just finished building my new gaming computer. I got a new job.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Caring and dedicated, Daniel enjoys inspiring his students and maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
participant_2.background: I get to work on a new project every day with the love of my life. I love my students. I try to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly because I want to get in better shape for my girlfriend and the baby. I sing in the church choir. I sometimes eat too much sugar, which can cause my blood sugar levels to spike.

content.text: I'm doing well! I got a new job working with the love of my life on a new project.
Oh that sounds awesome! I got a new job too, I'm a wedding planner who is always on the lookout for new business opportunities.
That's so cool! Do you like it?
Yeah, it's a lot of work, but I love it! I recently finished building my new gaming computer.
That's awesome! I love gaming too. I play in the church choir and try to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly.
That's really cool! I just love summer walking and reading.
Yeah, I have a lizard named Ragini.
That's so cool! I love lizards.
